titleInfo.title: Interview and performance - Neil Rosenberg - tape one of two - 2006-09-28

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Interview with and performance by Neil Rosenberg from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 28, 2006. Tape one of two. Audio portion of video interview. In partnership with the International Bluegrass Music Association.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
